articles.title: ‘Make Austria Great Again’: Thousands protest COVID-19 restrictions in Europe - Globalnews.ca
articles.description: Some of the more than 40,000 demonstrators in Vienna carried signs reading: "I will decide for myself," "Make Austria Great Again" and "New Elections."
articles.content:
Tens of thousands of protesters marched through several northwest European cities on Saturday to demonstrate against coronavirus restrictions imposed amid a surge in infections.

articles.title: Pope Francis criticises Europe’s divided response to migration crisis - The Guardian
articles.description: Pontiff uses visit to Greece to highlight plight of migrants and refugees, and voice concern over threat to democracy
articles.content:
Pope Francis has used a trip to Greece to hit out at Europe for the divisions it has exhibited over migration while also warning against the perils of populism.

articles.title: In democracy's birthplace, Pope Francis warns of populist threats - CTV News
